question: Which among the following is correct about B group Vitamins?
option1: Most of them are organic acids
option2: Most of them are water soluble
option3: Most of them are synthesized in the body
answer: Most of them are water soluble
explanation: B vitamins are a class of water-soluble vitamins that play important roles in cell metabolism. B vitamins are found in highest abundance in meat. The dietary supplements containing all eight are referred to as a vitamin B complex.
